ygData.subject: Re: Quick Keys/Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well that was what I gathered that you had a low ping time(cable modem) and had no trouble twisting three songs.  I did party with you remember =).  But
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 6 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> Just to clarify, I'm on a cable modem and my ping times are
> usually 80-130 ms. I have *no* trouble twisting three songs,
> and if I really try hard I can do four maybe every other
> round. But once the spells start flying, it's three if I'm
> lucky, usually two. I'm running at 1024x768 which probably
> doesn't help, but I don't want to give up the high resolution.
> :-)

Well that was what I gathered that you had a low ping time(cable modem)
and had no trouble twisting three songs. I did party with you remember
=). But the biggest overridding difference between the two of us is the
fact that you are runnin in 1024x768 and I am in 640x480. I am also
presuming that you are using glide and not DirectX for your card. Glide
is much better for the Voodoo line of cards. In this case the only
solution may be to get a faster processor and a better video card =). Me
I humbly play at 640x480, just couldn't stand the way your inventory
screen was not full screen when I ran at 800x600.

Treilanin Bard of Kelethin
Aariel Mage of Felwithe
